extract locations

Source: R/sf_helpers.R
sf_coordinates.Rd

Extract locations of sf objects.

Usage

sf_coordinates(sfj)

Arguments

sfj

An sf object or can be converted to sf by sf::st_as_sf().

Value

A matrix.

Examples

pts = sf::read_sf(system.file('extdata/pts.gpkg',package = 'sdsfun'))
sf_coordinates(pts)
#>              X       Y
#>  [1,] 321692.1 4004615
#>  [2,] 327093.8 3988283
